title: 1999/347/CFSP: Council Decision of 17 May 1999 repealing Common Position 98/614/CFSP concerning Nigeria
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 17 May 1999
repealing Common Position 98/614/CFSP concerning Nigeria
(1999/347/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Common Position 98/614/CFSP is hereby repealed as from 1 June 1999.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 May 1999.
For the Council
The President
J. FISCHER
(1) OJ L 293, 31.10.1998, p. 77.
